forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle before 9am. Partly sunny, with a high near 64. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun makes its hesitant appearance over Downtown San Francisco, the early hours are draped in a veil of patchy drizzle, whispering secrets of moisture into the air before the hour strikes nine. The temperature hovers gently around a cool embrace of sixty-four degrees, accompanied by a soft west-southwest wind that carries hints of adventure, though gusts tease with a flirtation of warmth. Yet, as the morning progresses, the clouds will attempt to lift, offering a glimpse of blue between their silvered edges, giving way to a day that may yet have its share of golden moments.

Tonight, the clouds will gather again, forming a cozy blanket as the mercury dips to fifty-seven. For those who venture outdoors, a light jacket will serve as a companion against the brisk winds that linger, subtly reminding all of the ocean’s breath. Perhaps indulge in a stroll through one of the city’s quaint neighborhoods, where the allure of a good coffee beckons, or lose oneself in the pages of a well-loved book at a local café, absorbing the rich literary ambiance that San Francisco so effortlessly offers. The day, marked by a mix of fleeting sunshine and lingering clouds, calls for the local charm to be savored—the hum of life continuing under a canvas of shifting skies, full of possibility.
